website_summaries.verdict: Super-fine mist that can be used on the face and even the hair.
pros: Even fair skin stands up to harsh sun with this spray
Non-clogging formula is resistant to water and sweat
cons: Can sting if it gets in the eyes

customer_reviews.title: Not functional well as expected
customer_reviews.text: I tried to spread it out onto face, but the smell with alcohol ingredient (maybe) made me not be able to open eyes. I had to spread in hands to apply by myself like old school cream form, I think it lost the point to buy spread. Also, it makes me look very oily after applying. Original idea I thought it’s more expensive and I can simply put in purse and spread while I’m outside and can’t wash hands. Clearly it doesn’t work. I end up still bought a balm to replace this spread.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Chang

customer_reviews.title: Never burn
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST sunscreen I’ve ever used. It’s a must to keep in my pool Bag. I only use it on my face and when I have used it I have never got a burn.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Put this on before going in the Texas sun and should be ok after 8 hours. I fish with this one application in the morning and haven’t burned all summer long. It smells pretty good too for sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Burbarry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I used it 3 times and i sun burned each time! Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Aken

customer_reviews.title: The alcohol really dries our my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin, but when I sprayed this on, my skin seems to dehydrate a lot as it showed on my makeup. If you need to go out quickly then this is good enough, but not for long-term use, alcohol is not good for your skin anyway.
customer_reviews.author: LUNA

customer_reviews.title: Probably a very good sunscreen but the sprayer stopped spraying when there was ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably a very good sunscreen but the sprayer stopped spraying when there was at least 1+ inches of product in the bottle. This happened in all three bottles that I had ordered.
customer_reviews.author: James R. McAraw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: The best sunscreen especially my husband loves to use it daily. Just spray and go
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei Bush

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my hair & scalp while in Maui. It protected great, the spray was lightweight and smelled wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Sandsmark

customer_reviews.title: Water resistance is the key thing i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Its a spray bsed and easy to use. It doesnt leave the white patches of zinc like other products.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh Kothari

customer_reviews.title: Sticky feeling
customer_reviews.text: It feels a sticky on my face if you put a lot, which I don't like since I use makeup over it. I just use it for body now since the spray is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a signature scent. Oily on face.
customer_reviews.text: Smells a little like hair spray. Wouldn't recommend for face.
customer_reviews.author: CoRnBrEd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shiseido one of best sun tan lotion out there 🙏❤🙏❤
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lui

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!  Shiseido Ultimate Sun Protection Spray
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PRODUCT! Shiseido Ultimate Sun Protection Spray I have FINALLY found the CORRECT sun protection. I along with my purchase, I choose to opt for the "add on" those were = lotion and the cream. Even my husband loves this product, he has already swiped the lotion from me for his outdoor activities. TAKE CARE OF YOUR SKIN AND BUY THIS PRODUCT IT'S WORTH THE COST!
customer_reviews.author: emptynester1968

customer_reviews.title: Cool and non-greasy...
customer_reviews.text: Environmentally safe for our coral reefs and a really wonderful sunscreen. It goes on and absorbs like water...no greasy or creamy mess, just a cool mist (I apply mine with a cotton pad to reduce waste) that absorbs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and quality
customer_reviews.text: So lazy to put on sunscreen so this spritzer is great! It does get into my eyes a bit but I am spraying right at them. Like others have said it is a bit greasy but all sunscreen is.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Very oily
customer_reviews.text: Very oily Can’t use on hair Looks like like an oil ball
customer_reviews.author: pam t

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: It's great that it's a spray, but it leaves a greasy film, so beware if you apply it over makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love shiseido.
customer_reviews.text: This spray is nice. Leaves your skin moisturized and protects you from harmful UV lights.
customer_reviews.author: Hany Tifa

customer_reviews.title: great. It is not my favorite form of sun ...
customer_reviews.text: great. It is not my favorite form of sun protection, but it's alright. It runs out faster than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: mingi

customer_reviews.title: No more sunburned face.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely look on my skin. Applies smoothly with the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Harada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use when I have makeup already on
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Coola and Supergoop, the spray bottle itself would get clogged up. In addition, spraying every 2 hours I found my skin to look super oily and it made my hair sticky and gross. I've been using this for a week and so far my skin isn't too bad with my makeup already set but at least my hair didn't end up sticky as well. I absolutely recommend this if you're wanting to keep your make up going all day along with using this every 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: PurrPurr

product_meta.title: Shiseido/Ultimate Spf 50 Sun Protection Spray 5.0 Oz (150 Ml)
product_meta.description:
Description 

A convenient spray-type sunscreen that allows quick, easy application over large areas of skin, especially hard-to-reach areas such as the back. It protects skin against powerful UV rays, while skincare ingredients maintain skin's beauty. With its light texture, it feels comfortable, with no stickiness.

Direction For sunscreen use:

 * Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
 * Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, at least every 2 hours.

Country of Origin Made in U.S.A.
feature_bullets: Shiseido Ultimate Sun Protection Spray SPF 50+
